## Decode raw, signed Ethereum transactions

##### Install

```
go install github.com/juztin/txdecode@latest
```

##### Decode

Use raw transaction value, excluding hex prefix: `0x`
_eg: `f86a8001830186a0941111111111111111111111111111111111111111885c6d12b6bc1a000080820a95a0aefd79d83eb00c538a9319ee9de0e4d2862070a67c77b823a2902c141f1e7574a02846a380b58fde67eb8dcbf2f2b84b55fc786306bf0005cce279418a684605f5`_

```
% txdecode "f86a8001830186a0941111111111111111111111111111111111111111885c6d12b6bc1a000080820a95a0aefd79d83eb00c538a9319ee9de0e4d2862070a67c77b823a2902c141f1e7574a02846a380b58fde67eb8dcbf2f2b84b55fc786306bf0005cce279418a684605f5"

  Hash:      0x1d9f5b5ccd40abb94487b24cedc287049a7abd1fc4478322c2bc191aaf03a703
  ChainID:   1337
  Type:      0
  From:      0x00000802aA66A9154683BFF51ec784E7dE161c12
  To:        0x1111111111111111111111111111111111111111
  Nonce:     0
  GasPrice:  1
  GasLimit:  100000
    v:       a95
    r:       aefd79d83eb00c538a9319ee9de0e4d2862070a67c77b823a2902c141f1e7574
    s:       2846a380b58fde67eb8dcbf2f2b84b55fc786306bf0005cce279418a684605f5
  Value:     6660000000000000000

```
